metadata.title: CVE-2018-11684 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Liblouis 3.5.0 has a stack-based Buffer Overflow in the functionincludeFile in compileTranslationTable.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-11684` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

liblouis-bin - 2.6.4-2ubuntu0.3
liblouis-data - 2.6.4-2ubuntu0.3
liblouis9 - 2.6.4-2ubuntu0.3
python-louis - 2.6.4-2ubuntu0.3
python3-louis - 2.6.4-2ubuntu0.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: liblouis package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.6.4-2ubuntu0.3').
